statements: DELETE FROM trade_executions WHERE quantity > 100 AND price < 50.00;
DELETE FROM trade_executions WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND quantity >= 100 AND price <= 50.00;
DELETE FROM market_activity WHERE action = 'SELL' AND trader_id = 5000;
DELETE FROM trade_history WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND executed_quantity < 100;
DELETE FROM trade_executions WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND price > 100;
DELETE FROM market_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Buy' AND activity_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM executions WHERE trade_id = (SELECT trade_id FROM trades WHERE symbol = 'AAPL');
DELETE FROM trades WHERE quantity < 100 AND price > 50;
